creator: peterj@liberate.com
text:
In a trunk build from CVS, I've discovered that <propertyfile> no longer updates
its file.  I haven't investigated much further to find out why, but replacing
version 1.9 with version 1.5 (which I had from another branch) works properly.

I'll attach a sample build.xml that displays the problem--run it multiple times
and see that "minor" and "build" are incremented.

creator: peterj@liberate.com
text:
Created attachment 741
build.xml exhibiting described propertyfile behaviour

creator: peterj@liberate.com
text:
I should clarify the initial report: the file is rewritten, but with its
original values.  I've narrowed down the introduction of the bug to version 1.6,
but haven't gotten as far as figuring out exactly why the new code isn't working
yet.
